thread.title: Audi's R&D boss, Porsche engine chief to quit -Bild
thread.title_full: Audi's R&D boss, Porsche engine chief to quit -Bild | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Audi's R&D boss, Porsche engine chief to quit -Bild
text:
BERLIN, Sept 24 Two of Volkswagen group's highest-ranking engineers will be forced to quit as the German carmaker is pushing steps to clear up the diesel emissions scandal, Bild reported on Thursday, citing unnamed company sources.
Audi's R&D boss Ulrich Hackenberg, a long-time VW brand executive and Porsche's engine chief Wolfgang Hatz will be dismissed at a meeting of the supervisory board on Friday, the newspaper said.
VW and Porsche declined comment while Audi couldn't be reached for comment.
(Reporting by Andreas Cremer and Jan Schwartz.)
